LanguageData.MagHediff.label: Half-Mag
LanguageData.MagHediff.description: The Mag Agent is bio-engineered to endure what most humans struggle with. Disease, non-fatal organ loss, and pain are only temporary distractions, but tasks not directly related to combat were also seen as distractions by its creators. Mag Agents are only capable of the most basic physical labor and lack much freewill, meaning they must be directly ordered to perform most simple tasks
